definition: possessing an extraordinary ability to attract
details:
adjective
- possessing an extraordinary ability to attract
= synonyms: charismatic
- having the properties of a magnet
= synonyms: attractive, magnetized, magnetised
- determined by earth's magnetic fields
= example: determined by earth's magnetic fields
- capable of being magnetized
- of or relating to or caused by magnetism
= example: of or relating to or caused by magnetism
